attributes.action: No testing or voluntary testing for double vaccinated people arriving to UK!
attributes.additional_details: High cost for families. Coverment should provide free testing for double vaccinated people if they want us to be tested.
attributes.background: Double vaccinated people don't need to be tested. They are protected between 60 % to 90 % against COVID 19.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/586189
